reviews.review_msg: This class was great. I dont understand why people complain about hard classes. Its 3rd year. Get used to it. Interesting topic but ya, study for M/T and final and you'll do fine. University is NOT highschool people! Definitely recommend 316!
Course was very interesting at times.  M/T was very hard.  Overall would recommend if you your willing to study and put a lot of time into the weekly 2 page papers.
Difficult class. Do not take it if you want to boost your grade.

exams are hard. average was very low for MT. Course content is interesting but his lectures are boring and confusing at times. LOTS of writing in this course. But he is occasionally funny and he doesnt mind helping students
This class seemed easy but the m.t and final was brutal. Very confusing things at time. Class was interesting but this class is definietly not a gpa booster. Beware

He was approachable if you talked to him after class. Expectations are really high for undergrades. He never posted his notes so if you missed the class then you missed the notes. He is Hot, he was nice to look at for sure, very smart but in life your looks don't make you a good teacher!

horrible.just horrible.he's not approachable.he seemed to make an effort NOT to attend his office hours.he doesn't respond to emails!i was so interested special topic, and he totally killed it for me.also, his midterm was unfair,one of the major questions was a trick question("underlying question").he's alright to look at, but save urself the pain
